model.traffic
Class Event

java.lang.Object
  model.traffic.Event

public class Event
extends java.lang.Object

Events that occur during the running of the simulator A generic Event Log used to pass information or store events

Version:
0.90
Author:
Antonio Garza

EID - event id
TID - trip id

Coordinates - coordinates of event location
ST - start time of event
Duration - duration of event
type - type of event
rep - reported?
rea - Reason for event
inter - interval of event
